# Arrow E-Commerce Monorepo - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern, production-ready e-commerce monorepo built with Next.js 16, Turborepo, Tailwind CSS 4, shadcn/ui, PNPM, and Biome.

## Monorepo Structure
- apps/web - Next.js e-commerce application
- packages/ui - Shared UI components (shadcn/ui)
- packages/utils - Shared utilities
- packages/ui-theme - Design system
- packages/config - Centralized configurations

## Development Guidelines
- Use PNPM for package management
- Follow Turborepo conventions for build caching
- Use Biome for code quality
- Implement server components where applicable
- Follow TypeScript strict mode
